title: please ㅠㅠ
body:
Starting. Press "Enter" to stop training and save model.

Trying to do the first iteration. If an error occurs, reduce the model parameters.

!!!
Windows 10 users IMPORTANT notice. You should set this setting in order to work correctly.
https://i.imgur.com/B7cmDCB.jpg
!!!
You are training the model from scratch. It is strongly recommended to use a pretrained model to speed up the training and improve the quality.

Error:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\DeepFaceLab_NVIDIA_RTX3000_series\_internal\DeepFaceLab\mainscripts\Trainer.py", line 159, in trainerThread
    model_save()
  File "C:\DeepFaceLab_NVIDIA_RTX3000_series\_internal\DeepFaceLab\mainscripts\Trainer.py", line 68, in model_save
    model.save()
  File "C:\DeepFaceLab_NVIDIA_RTX3000_series\_internal\DeepFaceLab\models\ModelBase.py", line 393, in save
    self.onSave()
  File "C:\DeepFaceLab_NVIDIA_RTX3000_series\_internal\DeepFaceLab\models\Model_SAEHD\Model.py", line 759, in onSave
    model.save_weights ( self.get_strpath_storage_for_file(filename) )
  File "C:\DeepFaceLab_NVIDIA_RTX3000_series\_internal\DeepFaceLab\core\leras\layers\Saveable.py", line 61, in save_weights
    d_dumped = pickle.dumps (d, 4)
MemoryError


Can I know some solution?
